Description: Uniformed bust of Lord Nelson facing, head three-quarter right. (obverse)
Curator's comments: Brown 1980 states: See Brown 1 p106.447. Bibliography: Milford Haven, Admiral the Marquis of. 'British Naval Medals', London, 1919, 478; Sandwich, The Rt. Hon. the Earl of. 'British and Foreign medals relating to naval and maritime affairs', 2nd ed., London, 1950, MM/4.
Bibliographic references: Brown 1980 / A catalogue of British historical medals 1760-1960, vol.I: the accession of George III to the death of William IV (p110.453)
Associated names: Named in inscription & portrayed: Horatio Nelson, 1st Baron and Viscount Nelson
Associated events: Commemoration of: Battle of the Nile, 1798
